title: This Clip Of Akshay Kumar Teaching Self-Defense To A School Girl Is Too Good For Words!
text:
This Clip Of Akshay Kumar Teaching Self-Defense To A School Girl Is Too Good For Words!
This Clip Of Akshay Kumar Teaching Self-Defense To A School Girl Is Too Good For Words!
Akshay Kumar is one actor who never stops inspiring us. Along with Aditya Thackeray, he participated in a training session to teach young girls basic self-defense techniques in Thane on Wednesday.
Agencies
Akshay took to his social media accounts to share a video from the event. In the video, he can be seen teaching a young girl a few basic techniques with which she can protect herself.
Screengrab
While the other school girls turned into cheerleaders for him, he captioned the video as:
Don't Miss 886 SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 24.3 K SHARES 17 K SHARES 11.2 K SHARES
“Happy to see a turnout of 2000 plus girls from nearby schools at our self defense training camp in Thane today. The workshop was to teach them some basic self defense techniques. Hoping it was helpful and to see more of them at our training centre.”
(With agency inputs)
